document.full_text: former republican utah governor jon huntsman has picked orlando, florida, for his 2012 presidential campaign headquarters should he decide to run, a campaign official and media reports said on wednesday.
document.title: former utah governor picks florida for campaign headquarters
lines_and_colors: former republican utah governor jon huntsman has picked orlando, florida, for his 2012 presidential campaign headquarters should he decide to run, a campaign official and media reports said on wednesday.
